alert.note: Alert for South Washington Cascade Foothills; South Washington Cascades (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 5:53AM PST until March 10 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST THIS EVENING ABOVE 1500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 1500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. * WHERE...South Washington Cascades and South Washington Cascade Foothills. * WHEN...Until 6 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: South Washington Cascade Foothills; South Washington Cascades
